title: Medallion, ca. 1900
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Circular medallion of a rampant eagle holding arrows in its left talon and an olive branch in the right talon. There is an escutcheon in the center of the eagle's breast and thirteen stars over its head.

tombstone.epitaph:
Medallion, ca. 1900.Medium: cotton
Technique: needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-58-23.
